synopsis.text: Only after achieving the coveted title of the Number One Samurai and avenging his father's death did Afro manage to find tranquility. However, his peaceful days are disrupted when an enigmatic woman, Sio, and an old foe, Jinno, steal his prized Number One headband and his father's remains. Tormented by the promise of suffering, Sio challenges Afro to reclaim the Number Two headband before confronting her. As Afro embarks on another violent journey, he must face the consequences of his past actions and the relentless cycle of vengeance that surrounds the Number One headband. With a newfound determination to put an end to the bloodshed, Afro must fight his way through a sea of enemies and rediscover his purpose as the world's greatest warrior.
